author: David Laris
method: Slice the halloumi into ½cm/¼in thick slices.   Char-grill or pan-fry the cheese in the olive oil.   Drizzle over the lemon juice and cracked black pepper and serve.
ingredients: 150g/5oz halloumi cheese ,  ½ a lemon, juiced ,  20ml/1oz olive oil ,  cracked black pepper to taste
